name: CTR Tempest Balaclava - Unisex
description: This cozy fleece balaclava shields your face from freezing temperatures. It’s got 4-way stretch with a soft fleece interior, and LYCRA® binding around the face to keep out the cold.Made of polyester and spandex stretch fabric with a soft fleece lining.3D form fit, three-panel construction.Flack-lock stitching for comfort and durability.Shaped bottom to seal out cold and prevent bunching.
